summary.para: Values that identify the intended use of a constant-data buffer.

blockquote.para: [!NOTE] For programming with Direct3D 10, this API has a type alias that begins D3D10_ instead of D3D_. These Direct3D 10 type aliases are defined in d3d10.h, d3d10misc.h, and d3d10shader.h.

remarks.para: D3D_SHADER_CBUFFER_FLAGS-typed values are specified in the uFlags member of the structure.

summary.para: Bind the constant buffer to an input slot defined in HLSL code (instead of letting the compiler choose the input slot).
Bind the constant buffer to an input slot defined in HLSL code (instead of letting the compiler choose the input slot).
